query:
SELECT
                u.id,
                u.username,
                u.display_name,
                u.is_active,
                COALESCE(t.cnt, 0) as "token_count!: i64",
                u.created_at,
                u.updated_at
            FROM users u
            LEFT JOIN (
                SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as cnt
                FROM api_tokens
                GROUP BY user_id
            ) t ON t.user_id = u.id
            WHERE u.is_service_account = true
              AND ($1 OR u.is_active = true)
            ORDER BY u.created_at DESC
